mods.name: Onikakushi Ch.1
mods.CFBundleName: Higurashi When They Cry - Ch.1 Onikakushi

radio.name: English
radio.description: Use the default language

radio.name: Apply French Language Patch
radio.description:
A patch including a full conversion of the game to French. **Please note:** 
 - 07th-mod doesn't directly support this community fork - instead, please visit the `#modding_french` channel of the 07th-mod discord, or raise an issue on the [French patch's Github page](https://github.com/orian34/onikakushi/issues)
 - Also consider checking out the [translator's site](https://www.hinamizawa.fr/trouver.htm) directly instead.

radio.name: Apply Italian Language Patch
radio.description:
A patch including a full conversion of the game to Italian. [More details here](https://github.com/Xorboth/onikakushi-ita/releases). Please note:
 - 07th-mod doesn't directly support this community fork - instead, please visit the #modding_italian channel of the 07th-mod discord, or raise an issue on the [Italian patch's Github page](https://github.com/Xorboth/onikakushi-ita/issues).
 - Also consider checking out the [translator's facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/cthtranslationsv2/) directly instead.
- You can contact them directly on their discord (https://discord.gg/nNHQxZ7)

radio.name: Apply Ukrainian language patch
radio.description:
A patch including a full conversion of the game to Ukrainian. **Please note:** 
 - 07th-Mod doesn't directly support this community fork. Please contact the patch developers [on Telegram](https://t.me/OnigafuchiUA) for support.

radio.name: Aplicar parche en Español / Apply Spanish language patch
radio.description:
Parche que incluye una traducción completa del juego al Español. **Ten en cuenta:**
 - Los desarrolladores de 07th-Mod no son parte de este Fork comunitario. Por favor, para cualquier problema con la instalación contáctate con los responsables del parche mediante [Discord](https://discord.gg/urDawUn4Nq).
 - Alternativamente, [deja un comentario en la guía de Steam](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2764742715).

radio.name: Apply Russian language patch
radio.description:
A patch including a full conversion of the game to Russian. **Please note:** 
 - 07th-mod doesn't directly support this community fork - instead, please contact the creator [by e-mail](mailto:wf1264962@gmail.com?subject=Onikakushi).

checkBox.name: HD Ryukishi Sprites
checkBox.description: Replaces the original (640x480) sprites with upscaled HD versions (1280x960)

mods.name: Rei
mods.CFBundleName: Higurashi When They Cry Hou - Rei

mods.name: Console Arcs
mods.CFBundleName: Higurashi When They Cry - Console Arcs
mods.CFBundleIdentifier: unity.MangaGamer.Higurashi When They Cry - Console Arcs

checkBox.name: Restore system0
checkBox.description: The unmodded game's "system0" BGM is missing a sample from Star Trek: Nemesis (removed for copyright reasons) - this option restores the missing sample.

checkBox.name: Use SuiSui-SWEETS(^-^)
checkBox.description: In one scene, the PS3 game replaces a copyrighted song with a new original song, "SuiSui-SWEETS(^-^)". This option allows you to use the song from the PS3 version.

checkBox.name: Make Jessica British
checkBox.description: - In one scene, the PS3 game replaces a CG of a Touhou character with another CG for copyright reasons. This option lets you use the censored PS3 CG.

radio.name: PS3 sprites (default)
radio.description: Use sprites from the PS3 game. No additional download required.

radio.name: Pachinko Sprites
radio.description:
The game will use upscaled Pachinko Sprites (Mangagamer sprites).
 An additional 550MB of download is required.
 Please note that some scenes may still show the PS3 sprites, and some characters have no pachinko sprite, so the PS3 sprite will be used.

radio.name: Ryukishi Sprites
radio.description:
The game will use upscaled Ryukishi Sprites (Old/Potato sprites).
 An additional 550MB of download is required.
 Please note that some scenes may still show the PS3 sprites.

radio.name: Revert to PS3 Sprites
radio.description: Use this option to go back to the PS3 sprites, if you previously installed the Pachinko or Ryukishi sprites.

radio.name: No Change
radio.description: No change to scripts

radio.name: Experimental Script
radio.description:
This script fixes the mod having no auto advancement of text. However it may introduce other bugs (such as the text disappearing issue), so please be warned. Let us know if this script worked for you on our [discord server](https://discord.gg/pf5VhF9) or on this [github issue](https://github.com/07th-mod/umineko-question/issues/155).

**Please do not apply this while you're in the middle of playing a episode, as your saves will not load properly anymore.**

radio.name: Revert to normal script
radio.description: This reverts your game to the normal script, if it was previously on the experimental one. **Please do not apply this while you're in the middle of playing a episode, as your saves will not load properly anymore.**

radio.name: No Change
radio.description: No change to engine

radio.name: Windows Experimental Engine / Executable
radio.description:
WINDOWS ONLY. This experimental engine option [improves performance (especially on older computers) and fixes some bugs/crashes](https://github.com/07th-mod/ponscripter-umineko/releases). However, **saves are not compatible**, and it may cause other bugs. Use at your own risk.

NOTE: To uninstall this option, you must manually download and install the full patch executable/voice-only executable (or force re-install the whole mod). See the manual install instructions on the wiki.

radio.name: MacOS Experimental Engine / Executable
radio.description: Same as above, MACOS ONLY

radio.name: Linux Steam Experimental Engine / Executable
radio.description:
Same as above, For LINUX STEAM.

NOTE: **Only use this if you are running the game through the Steam launcher** - use the below `nodep` version if you are planning to run the game without Steam running.

radio.name: Linux GOG/MangaGamer Experimental Engine / Executable (nodep)
radio.description:
Same as above, for LINUX GOG/MangaGamer.

This 'nodep' version fixes problems with missing libraries, such as having no sound at all due to missing PulseAudio libs.

checkBox.name: Keep Temporary Downloads
checkBox.description:
Normally, temporary downloads are deleted when the install completes succesfully.
Keeping downloads will allow you to skip downloading when performing a full re-install, but will occupy space on disk until you delete them manually.
Downloads are kept in the `07th-mod_installer\install_data\[GAME NAME] Downloads` folder

radio.name: Restore and Repair BGM
radio.description:
- The unmodded game's "system0" BGM is missing a sample from Star Trek: Nemesis (removed for copyright reasons) - this option restores the missing sample.
- The unmodded game's "kuina.ogg" was slightly corrupted at the 53 second mark - this option repairs the corruption.

radio.name: No BGM Changes
radio.description: Keep the currently installed Background Music

radio.name: PS3 sprites (default)
radio.description: Use sprites from the PS3 game. No additional download required.

radio.name: Pachinko Sprites
radio.description:
The game will use upscaled Pachinko Sprites (Mangagamer sprites).
 An additional 550MB of download is required.
 Please note that some scenes may still show the PS3 sprites, and some characters have no pachinko sprite, so the PS3 sprite will be used.

radio.name: Ryukishi Sprites
radio.description:
The game will use upscaled Ryukishi Sprites (Old/Potato sprites).
 An additional 550MB of download is required.
 Please note that some scenes may still show the PS3 sprites.

radio.name: Revert to PS3 Sprites
radio.description: Use this option to go back to the PS3 sprites, if you previously installed the Pachinko or Ryukishi sprites.

radio.name: No Change
radio.description: No change to scripts

radio.name: Experimental Script
radio.description:
This script fixes the mod having no auto advancement of text. However it may introduce other bugs (such as the text disappearing issue), so please be warned. Let us know if this script worked for you on our [discord server](https://discord.gg/pf5VhF9) or on this [github issue](https://github.com/07th-mod/umineko-answer/issues/72).

**Please do not apply this while you're in the middle of playing a episode, as your saves will not load properly anymore.**
